s0251: Xiao Zhao because of flesh and blood closeness, could not bear to apply law, generously pardoned Dan's wife and children, demoted to commoners.
s0252: Tradition says 'orchid root and angelica, soaked in brine, worthy men do not approach, common men do not wear', this is why it is so.
s0253: Xuan Emperor first established, extended benevolence proclaimed virtue, in Benshi first year middle all restored enfeoffment of King Dan of Yan's two sons: one son as An Ding Marquis;
s0254: established Yan's former crown prince Jian as King of Guangyang, to carry out Yan king's sacrifices.
